There was a lo=
w hiss from DINOBOT.  Their circumstnaces were equally precarious..  But, h=
e reviewed his mental files on TARANTALUS.  Yes, the best way to get the SP=
IDER to respond was to bait him, and see if he overplaid his hand.

"Well, =
TARANTALUS.."  DINOBOT casually gestured, "Hasn't it always been that way? =
 A hole in time, a tessaract reforming.  What makes this new one so special=
 then that only you have the.."  He hissed, "Knowledge to patch it.  And if=
 you have this knowledge, convenient that it only comes to play now."

DINO=
BOT went on "So, obviously this new rip cannot renmotely be such a graphic =
threat as you say then, for if it was you would have already fixed it to pr=
eserve your own spark."

A challenge of his capabilities, a smidgen of bait=
